DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate effect single 84-milligram ( mg ) dose intranasal esketamine compare placebo , next day drive performance repeat administration 84 mg intranasal esketamine same-day driving performance assess mean difference standard deviation lateral position ( SDLP ) on-road drive test .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects Single-Dose Repeat-Administration Intranasal Esketamine On-Road Driving Participants With Major Depressive Disorder
